SummaryEnglish: Lamune has returned to Earth with no memory of his adventures on Hara-Hara world and Doki-Doki space. The remains of Gobuhriki find their way to Earth, and awaken the spirit of Don Harumage. While Cocoa builds a fighting vehicle with stuff she finds around Tokyo, Milk and Leska set off to find Lamune and Da Cider to save the day before the new Gobuhriki is revived and destroys the Earth.
TitleJapanese: NG騎士ラムネ&40EX ビクビクトライアングル愛の嵐大作戦
SummaryJapanese: ハラハラ世界、ドキドキ空間での冒険の記憶を失ったまま地球に戻ってきたラムネ。 ゴブフリキの残骸が地球にたどり着き、ドン・ハルマゲの魂を目覚めさせる。 ココアが東京周辺で見つけた材料で戦闘車両を作る一方、ミルクとレスカは新型ゴブフリキが復活して地球を破壊する前日を救うため、ラムネとダ・サイダーを探しに出発する。
Aliases: NG Knight Ramune & 40 EX: Biku Biku Triangle Ai no Arashi Daisakusen

1.TitleEnglish: Trembling Triangle Operation: Love Storm 1 Love, Resumed
1.TitleJapanese: Furueru sankaku sakusen ai no arashi 1 ai, saikai

2.TitleEnglish: Trembling Triangle Operation: Love Storm 2 Love, Swept Away
2.TitleJapanese: Furueru sankaku sakusen ai no arashi 2 ai, nagasa rete iku

3.TitleEnglish: Trembling Triangle Operation: Love Storm 3 Love Triumphant
3.TitleJapanese: Furueru sankaku sakusen ai no arashi 3 ainoshōri
